00041 Repository::Repository(cstr repositoryName) :
00042     repositoryName(repositoryName), exitTimerThread(false), 
00043     timerThreadStarted(false), udpManager(0), tcpManager(0),
00044     remotePropertyManager(0),  remoteSubscriptionRegister(this)
00045 {
00046     if (repositoryName == "") {
00047         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Cannot create an unnamed repository!");
00048         exit(-1);   // XXX
00049     }
00050     addGenericProperty(QUEUE_CLASSNAME, PROPERTY_OUTBOX, "Outbox");
00051     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_OUTBOX)->setObject(new RObjectPipeQueue(PROPERTY_OUTBOX));
00052     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_OUTBOX)->setReadonly(true);
00053     addGenericProperty(QUEUE_CLASSNAME, PROPERTY_INBOX, "Inbox");
00054     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_INBOX)->setObject(new RObjectPipeQueue(PROPERTY_INBOX));
00055     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_INBOX)->setReadonly(true);
00056     
00057     createStorage("RInt", PROPERTY_UDP_PORT, "My UDP port");
00058     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_UDP_PORT)->setReadonly(true);
00059     createStorage("RInt", PROPERTY_TCP_LISTENING_PORT, "My listening TCP port");
00060     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_TCP_LISTENING_PORT)->setReadonly(true);
00061     createStorage("RString", PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES_FILENAME, "Yellow pages filename", 0);
00062     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES_FILENAME)->setReadonly(true);
00063     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES_FILENAME)->setPersistent(false);
00064     createStorage("RYellowPages", PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, "Yellow pages");
00065     getLocalProperty(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES)->setObject(new RYellowPages());
00066     createStorage("RDouble", PROPERTY_UDP_RENEWAL_INTERVAL, "UDP Renewal interval", 
00067         new RDouble(1000., RDouble::MS));
00068     createStorage("RDouble", PROPERTY_UDP_RENEWAL_TIMEOUT, "UDP Renewal timeout", 
00069         new RDouble(2000., RDouble::MS));
00070 }
00071 
00072 Repository::~Repository()
00073 {
00074     endRepositoryThreads();
00075     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE); // ;-)
00076     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.begin(); 
00077     it != localProperties.end(); ++it) delete it->second;
00078     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = remoteProperties.begin();
00079     it != remoteProperties.end(); ++it) delete it->second;
00080     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void Repository::endRepositoryThreads()
00084 {
00085     if (timerThreadStarted) {
00086         exitTimerThread = true;
00087         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Waiting for timer thread to exit");
00088         pthread_join(timerThreadId, 0);
00089         timerThreadStarted = false;
00090     }
00091 
00092     #define DELETE_AND_SET_ZERO(x) if(x) { delete x; x=0; }
00093     
00094     DELETE_AND_SET_ZERO(remotePropertyManager);
00095     DELETE_AND_SET_ZERO(tcpManager);
00096     DELETE_AND_SET_ZERO(udpManager);
00097 }

00099 bool Repository::loadYellowPages(cstr ypFilename)
00100 {
00101     bool b = false;
00102     if (ypFilename != "") {
00103         RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Loading yellow pages from file '%s'", ypFilename.c_str());
00104         try {
00105             lock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES, WHERE("Loading yellow pages from file"));
00106             try {
00107                 RYellowPages* yp = getObjectAsL<RYellowPages>(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00108                 b = yp->loadFromFile(ypFilename);   // NOTE: error is managed by the function itself
00109             }
00110             catch (const SessionException& e) {
00111                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00112             }
00113             unlock(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES);
00114         }
00115         catch (const SessionException& e) {
00116             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00117         }
00118     }
00119     if (b) setObject(PROPERTY_YELLOWPAGES_FILENAME, new RString(ypFilename));
00120     return b;
00121 }

00123 vector<string> getOptionsFromTextConfig(cstr val, string& newVal)
00124 {
00125     newVal = val;
00126     size_t a = val.find_first_of("[");
00127     size_t b = val.find_last_of("]");
00128     if (a == string::npos) return vector<string>();
00129     else {
00130         if (b == string::npos) {
00131             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Malformed text configuration");
00132             return vector<string>();
00133         }
00134         else {
00135             string z = val.substr(a+1, b-a-1);
00136             vector<string> v = tokenize(z, ",");
00137             for (size_t i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) v[i] = trim(v[i]);
00138             return v;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 }

00143 void Repository::setPropertyValueFromTextConfig(cstr key, cstr val, CUrl urlContext, Session* session)
00144     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00145 {
00146     Url url = Url(key).contextualize(urlContext);
00147     try {
00148         if (val[0] == '@') {
00149             // it is a link
00150             session->linkCreate(url, val.substr(1));
00151         }
00152         else if (val[0] == '$') {
00153 /*          // it is saved as an external file
00154             string nval;
00155             vector<string> opts = getOptionsFromTextConfig(val.substr(1), nval);
00156             bool loadFromXml = true;
00157             for (size_t i = 0; i < opts.size(); i++) {
00158                 if (opts[i] == "BINARY") loadFromXml = false;
00159                 else if (opts[i] == "XML") ;
00160                 else {
00161                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Unrecognized option '%s'", opts[i].c_str());
00162                 }
00163             }
00164             session->lock(url, HERE);
00165             try {
00166                 Reader* reader;
00167                 if (loadFromXml) reader = new XmlReader();
00168                 else reader = new BinaryReader();
00169                 string fileContent = fsReadFile(nval);
00170                 RDK2::Object* obj = (RDK2::Object*) reader->deserialize(fileContent);
00171                 session->setObject(obj);
00172                 delete reader;
00173             }
00174             catch (const ReadingException& e) {
00175                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00176             }
00177             session->unlock(url);*/
00178         }
00179         else {
00180             session->lock(url, HERE);
00181             try {
00182                 RDK2::Object* obj = session->getObjectOrCreateItL(url);
00183                 if (obj && !obj->loadFromStringRepresentation(val)) {
00184                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Cannot load property '%s' value from '%s'",
00185                         url.c_str(), val.c_str());
00186                 }
00187             }
00188             catch (const SessionException& e) {
00189                 RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00190             }
00191             session->unlock(url);
00192         }
00193     }
00194     catch (const SessionException& e) {
00195         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00196     }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void Repository::startRepositoryThreads()
00200 {
00201     udpManager = new UdpManager(this);
00202     tcpManager = new TcpManager(this);
00203     remotePropertyManager = new RemotePropertyManager(this);
00204 
00205     udpManager->init();
00206     tcpManager->init();
00207     remotePropertyManager->init();
00208 
00209     udpManager->start();
00210     tcpManager->start();
00211     remotePropertyManager->start();
00212 
00213     pthread_create(&timerThreadId, 0, (void*(*)(void*)) timerThreadExec, this);
00214     timerThreadStarted = true;
00215 }

00217 Session* Repository::createSession(cstr name, cstr description, cstr urlContext)
00218 {
00219     return new Session(name, description, urlContext, this);
00220 }

00222 void Repository::addGenericProperty(cstr className, CUrl url, cstr description, RDK2::Object* defaultObject)
00223     throw (InvalidOperation)
00224 {
00225     //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Adding property " + url);
00226     if (!url.isAbsolute()) throw InvalidOperation("Url has to be absolute ('" + url + "')");
00227 
00228     // XXX url.valid()
00229     if (url.find_first_of(" \n") != string::npos)
00230         throw InvalidOperation("Url cannot contain spaces or newlines (" + url + ")");
00231 
00232     if (defaultObject && defaultObject->getClassName() != className)
00233         throw InvalidOperation("defaultValue class (" + 
00234             defaultObject->getClassName() + ") does not match " +
00235             "property class (" + className + ")");
00236 
00237 
00238     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00239     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.find(url);
00240     if (it != localProperties.end() && !it->second->deleted) {
00241         propertiesMutex.unlock();
00242         throw InvalidOperation("Property '" + url + "' is already in the repository");
00243     }
00244 
00245     if (it != localProperties.end() && it->second->deleted) {
00246         // FIXME che ne facciamo della property eliminata? delete ï¿½troppo pericoloso?
00247         Property* p = new Property(url, className, defaultObject);
00248         p->description = description;
00249         localProperties[url] = p; 
00250     }
00251     else {
00252         Property* p = new Property(url, className, defaultObject);
00253         p->description = description;
00254         p->def.setDescription(description);
00255         localProperties[url] = p;
00256     }
00257 
00258     for (multimap<string, Session*>::iterator it = sessionsListeningToTree.begin();
00259     it != sessionsListeningToTree.end(); ++it) {
00260         if (url.startsWith(it->first)) {
00261             it->second->pushEvent(new EventPropertyTreeAdded(url));
00262         }
00263     }
00264 
00265     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00266 }
00267 
00268 void Repository::deleteProperty(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00269 {
00270     if (!url.isAbsolute()) throw InvalidOperation("Url has to be absolute ('" + url + "')");
00271 
00272     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00273     map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.find(url);
00274     if (it == localProperties.end()) {
00275         propertiesMutex.unlock();
00276         throw NoSuchProperty("Property '" + url + "' is not in the repository");
00277     }
00278 
00279     // we do not erase any property, we just mark it as "deleted"
00280     it->second->deleted = true;
00281 
00282     for (multimap<string, Session*>::iterator it = sessionsListeningToTree.begin();
00283     it != sessionsListeningToTree.end(); ++it) {
00284         if (url.startsWith(it->first)) {
00285             it->second->pushEvent(new EventPropertyTreeDeleted(url));
00286         }
00287     }
00288 
00289     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00290 }

00292 const RDK2::Object* Repository::getObjectLC(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty)
00293 {
00294     return getProperty(url)->getObjectLC();

00297 RDK2::Object* Repository::getObjectL(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty)
00298 {
00299     return getProperty(url)->getObjectL();
00300 }
00301 
00302 RDK2::Object* Repository::getObjectOrCreateItL(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00303 {
00304     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00305     RDK2::Object* obj = p->getObjectL();
00306     if (obj) return obj;
00307     else {
00308         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Creating an object of class '%s'", p->getObjectClassName().c_str());
00309         if (p->getObjectClassName() == "") 
00310             throw InvalidOperation("Trying to create an object for an unclassed property");
00311         else {
00312             obj = RDK2::Meta::forName(p->getObjectClassName());
00313             p->setObjectL(obj);
00314             return obj;
00315         }
00316     }
00317 }

00319 void Repository::lock(CUrl url, Stack w) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00320 {
00321     getProperty(url)->lock(w);
00322 }
00323 
00324 void Repository::unlock(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00325 {
00326     getProperty(url)->unlock();
00327 }

00329 map<Url, string> Repository::getLocalPropertyNames()
00330 {
00331     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00332     map<Url, string> ret;
00333     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.begin();
00334     it != localProperties.end(); ++it) {
00335         if (!it->second->deleted) ret.insert(make_pair(it->first, it->second->getObjectClassName()));
00336     }
00337     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00338     return ret;
00339 }
00340 
00341 map<Url, string> Repository::getRemotePropertyNames(cstr host)
00342 {
00343     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00344     map<Url, string> ret;
00345     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = remoteProperties.begin();
00346     it != remoteProperties.end(); ++it) {
00347         if (!it->second->deleted) {
00348             if (host != "" && it->first.getHost() == host) {
00349                 ret.insert(make_pair(it->first, it->second->getObjectClassName()));
00350             }
00351         }
00352     }
00353     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00354     return ret;
00355 }
00356 
00357 vector<Url> Repository::getLocalPropertiesStartingWith(string prefix)
00358 {
00359     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00360     vector<Url> v;
00361     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.begin();
00362     it != localProperties.end(); ++it) {
00363         if( !it->second->deleted && startsWith(it->first, prefix.c_str()) )
00364             v.push_back(it->first);
00365     }
00366     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00367     return v;
00368 }

00371 
00372 uint gcd(uint a, uint b)
00373 {
00374     if (a * b == 0) return 0;
00375     while (true) {
00376         a = a % b;
00377         if (a == 0) return b;
00378         b = b % a;
00379         if (b == 0) return a;
00380     }
00381 }
00382 
00383 void Repository::timerThread()
00384 {
00385     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Starting timer thread");
00386     uint waitMs = 1000;
00387     while (usleep(waitMs * 1000), !exitTimerThread) {
00388         sessionsListeningToTimerMutex.lock(HERE);
00389         waitMs = 1000;
00390         for (map<Session*, SessionTimer>::iterator it = sessionsListeningToTimer.begin();
00391         it != sessionsListeningToTimer.end(); ++it) {
00392             //RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("timer is now " << it->second.timer.getMs() << ", I wait until " <<
00393             //  it->second.interval);
00394             if (it->second.timer.getMs() >= it->second.interval) {
00395                 it->first->pushEvent(new EventTimer());
00396                 //it->first->wakeUp();  // NOTE: wakeUp is called by pushEvent
00397                 it->second.timer.start();
00398             }
00399             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("waitMs was %d", waitMs);
00400             waitMs = gcd(waitMs, (uint) it->second.interval);
00401             //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("gcd with %d becomes %d", (uint) it->second.interval, waitMs);
00402             if (waitMs < 10) waitMs = 10;
00403         }
00404         sessionsListeningToTimerMutex.unlock();
00405     }
00406 }
00407 
00408 void Repository::saveAllDefaultPropertyDefs()
00409 {
00410     propertiesMutex.lock(HERE);
00411     for (map<Url, Property*>::iterator it = localProperties.begin();
00412     it != localProperties.end(); ++it) {
00413         it->second->saveDefaultPropertyDef();
00414     }
00415     propertiesMutex.unlock();
00416 }
